message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $120.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to consider $100 for it?
Hi Bob, I understand you're on a tight budget, but I've got to make a living. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $110, but I'm not going any lower than that.
